summary: Bug fix verification complete - MaintenanceTrackingPage crash fixed and STAS Mirror Branding tab verified working. Both features now load and function correctly.

issues: React hydration warning: span inside tbody - non-critical, does not affect functionality

MaintenanceTrackingPage_crash_fix.description: Page loads successfully without crash. Navigated to /maintenance-tracking, page rendered with header, stats cards, filter buttons, search, and 'New Card' button. No white screen or JavaScript errors.

STAS_Mirror_Branding_Tab.description: Branding tab (الهوية) clickable and shows company settings form. Form includes: company logo upload, side image upload, welcome text (AR/EN), company name (AR/EN), and login page colors section.

critical_code_review_comments: MaintenanceTrackingPage.js: Lines 186-195 and 253-260 now correctly reference STATUSES array properties (label_ar, label_en, color) without the invalid s.icon reference
STASMirrorPage.js: TabsTrigger for 'company-settings' at line 769-771 has correct data-testid and tab value
STASMirrorPage.js: TabsContent for company-settings (lines 2117-2367) renders correctly with form elements
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fixes verified: 1) MaintenanceTrackingPage.js s.icon crash - FIXED, page loads at /maintenance-tracking route. 2) STAS Mirror Branding tab - WORKING, tab data-testid='tab-company-settings' clicks correctly and shows company settings form. Minor React hydration warning in STASMirrorPage about span in tbody is non-critical.

bug_1_maintenance_crash.root_cause: MaintenanceTrackingPage.js was referencing s.icon property in STATUSES array mapping, but STATUSES objects don't have an 'icon' property - they only have 'value', 'label_ar', 'label_en', and 'color'
bug_1_maintenance_crash.fix_applied: Removed invalid s.icon reference from lines 186-195 and 253-260
bug_1_maintenance_crash.verification: Page now loads without crash, showing all maintenance tracking features

bug_2_branding_tab.root_cause: No bug - user needed verification that the tab works correctly
bug_2_branding_tab.verification: Tab with data-testid='tab-company-settings' clicks correctly and displays company settings form with logo upload, side image, welcome text, company name, and color settings
